lcInstruction.p: Following the <steps> element, you can use the <result> element to describe the end result of a successful completion of the task.

You might use this to describe what the reader will see for confirmation that the task has succeeded, a simple test the reader might perform to verify the end result, or merely provide a congratulatory message to the reader.
